sentences.english: He saw only her long chestnut lashes , permeated with shadow and modesty.
sentences.chinese: 他只見到栗色的長睫毛，掩映着幽嫺貞靜的神態。

sentences.english: There was no large window in the room, and the chestnut windows were all wooden.
sentences.chinese: 屋子沒有大窗口，那栗色的窗子又一律是木格的。

sentences.english: I'll bet ten dollars on the chestnut horse.
sentences.chinese: 我要在這匹栗色馬上下十元賭注。

sentences.english: The sorrel easily won the race.
sentences.chinese: 那匹栗色馬輕易地贏了那場賽馬。

sentences.english: Everyone expected the chestnut to win.
sentences.chinese: 大家都預期那匹栗色的馬能獲勝。

sentences.english: The blight killed almost every chestnut tree in the United States.
sentences.chinese: 枯萎病在美國殺了幾乎每一栗色的樹。

sentences.english: Black with tan markings, either of rich chestnut or mahogany color.
sentences.chinese: 黑色帶棕色斑紋，也可以是栗色或桃木色。

sentences.english: a travel mug, in beautiful maroon.
I was then allowed to wear the paratrooper's prestigious maroon turban.
sentences.chinese: 隨後戴上了享有聲望的傘兵栗色頭巾。

sentences.english: She knew he wanted that chestnut mare something fierce. Lied to him, she did.
sentences.chinese: 她知道他想要像栗色的馬那樣兇猛的東西。

sentences.english: This cashmere sweater looks pretty good. Do you have this style in chestnut?
sentences.chinese: 這件羊絨衫看起來真不錯。你們有這款栗色的嗎？

sentences.english: Against one wall of her room stands a chestnut bureau. A porcelain wash basin sits on the bureau.
sentences.chinese: 靠牆有張栗色的化妝臺，上面放着一個瓷臉盆。

sentences.english: It was drawn by an old bay horse and a little grey-and-white burro.
sentences.chinese: 拉着它的是匹栗色的馬和一頭灰白的小毛驢。

sentences.english: She wears a sorrel coat today.
sentences.chinese: 她今天穿着件栗色的外套。

sentences.english: Medium-intense, cherry-red color with a maroon rim.
sentences.chinese: 顏色適中，櫻桃紅裏透着一圈栗色光環。

sentences.english: The feathers shone chestnut colour and copper colour.
sentences.chinese: 這對翅膀的羽毛呈栗色和銅色。
